title: All Natural Stretch Mark Healing Body Butter
directions: Place all ingredients into your food processor and blend until completely smooth stopping to scrape down the sides.
Place fresh body butter into sealed tight containers and store in a cool dark place (I use mason jars and store mine in my bathroom cabinet. You just do not want this in direct sunlight).
Apply to skin directly after bathing or showering every morning or evening.
*If you are working on preventing stretch marks (growing, pregnant, etc) you will want to apply your body butter to your areas of concern every morning and every evening.
ingredients: 1/2 Cup Organic Extra Virgin Cold Pressed Olive Oil
1/2 Cup Organic Fair Trade Shea Butter
3 Tbsp Organic Rose Hip Seed Oil
10 Capsules Pure Vitamin E (opened and poured into mixture)
